mean_cn: n. 【影视】（译文）字幕，（书籍）副标题
mean_en: words that translate what is said in a film/movie into a different language and appear on the screen at the bottom. Subtitles are also used, especially on television, to help deaf people (= people who cannot hear well).; a second title of a book that appears after the main title and gives more information
sentence: With subtitles we can understand the dialogue of this foreign movie.
sentence_trans: 有了字幕，我们就能理解这部外国电影的对话。
word_etyma: sub在下面，次一等 ＋ title标题 → subtitle副标题
